home.name: Gabriel Grad
home.about_me: I'm interested in the Web Development path.
home.description: I am a Angular Developer who is interested in Angular/JavaScript and focused on building beautiful interfaces and experiences. I am most comfortable working with Angular and JavaScript, however, I would be open to learning Java to integrate into a full stack role in future.

about.title: About Me
about.description_one: My forte is working with Angular and JavaScript, however, since starting my path to Web Development, I'm interested in learning something new every day and expand my knowledge. I would like to learn Java to integrate into a full stack role in the near future and hopefully cross paths with amazing human beings, who are open for mentoring.
about.description_two: I am a Angular Developer who is interested in Angular/JavaScript and focused on building beautiful interfaces and experiences. I am most comfortable working with Angular and JavaScript, however, I would be open to learning Java to integrate into a full stack role in future.

job_description.acessa: Developed key features and maintained a large web application using Angular
job_description.p4b_1: Developed key features and maintained a large web application using Angular
job_description.p4b_2: Defined and researched product features as part of the product team
job_description.p4b_3: Designed and developed the Dashboard & Reports page for the customer-facing application by following an elaborate design
job_description.p4b_4: Worked closely with BE developers, designers, project managers, etc. as part of an Agile team
job_description.p4b_5: Worked on bug fixing and improving application performance
job_description.p4b_6: Contributed on making the application responsive on mobile devices

projects.title: Some Things I've Built
projects.description_1: It is a project created to improve my JavaScript skills and for styling I only used Css.
projects.description_2: It is a project created to improve my JavaScript skills

contact.title: Contact
contact.description_1: If you enjoyed my work and want to start a project, I'm open to start new exciting stuff! Contact me and I'll get back to you as soon as posible with details.
contact.description_2: If you're kind enough to leave a feedback, share some wisdom with me, I'm happy to connect!
